scripts.build: bun install && cd ../svelte && bun run installBuild
scripts.dev: concurrently "DEV=TRUE bun --watch src/index.ts" "cd ../svelte && bun run dev" "docker compose up" -n Server,Kit,DB -c blue,yellow,green
scripts.preview: concurrently "bun run start" "docker compose up" -n Server,DB -c blue,green
